Articles.Content:
I'm running ksp version 1.10.1, and I seem to constantly, but unreliably, crash in the VAB. I'm only running a couple mods, and i've tried the other solutions like restarting and verifying cache, and even a full uninstall and reinstall, but nothing seems to work. What's causing it, and how do I fix it?

Context:

I was in the VAB building a rocket when the screen turns to black, then the game crashes. I wasn't doing anything particularly straining, apart from the visual mods I have, and I wasn't placing or removing large amounts of parts, just scrolling down to see my rocket.

Logs:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/biczpz1zus5l9d1/error.log?dl=0 (Crash log)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/kxbi0t23r4qj872/output_log.txt?dl=0 (Output log)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/q3vdefcb11cdmcg/Player.log?dl=0 (Player log)

 

PC specs:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/rr14k0crylne38i/DxDiag.txt?dl=0

 

Mods:

Spoiler

Kerbal space program V1.10.1 for steam

Scatterer V.0.0723

Scatterer default config V0.0723

Scatterer sunflare V0.0723

Kopernicus plantetary modifier release-1.12.0-47

Waterfall restock 0.2.2

Waterfall core 0.6.5

Hide empty tech tree nodes 1.2.0

Beyond home 1.5.2

Parallax 1.0.1

Module manager 4.0,4

Science full reward (continued) v5.2

Community tech tree 3.4.3

EVE redux 1.11.3.1

Restock 1.2.1

Restock+ 1.2.1

Modular flight integrator 1.2.7.0

Science full transmit v1.1

All mods have been installed using ckan, and all mods are fully up to date at the time of writing according to ckan.

 

Thanks for your time of considering this question

Edited June 26, 2021 by Gemspark
Didn't mention what I needed.
